Description: Clover builds smart, customized point of sale systems that make running your business easier.
Name: Clover

Methods.Name: Get Customer List
Methods.Description: Gives information for every customer of a merchant.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Returns information for a single customer.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer
Methods.Description: Deletes a single customer from a merchant.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Updates information for a single customer.

Methods.Name: Get New Customer List
Methods.Description: Gives information for every customer of a merchant since last run datetime

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Creates an customer for a merchant.

Methods.Name: Get Orders List
Methods.Description: Returns a list of orders.

Methods.Name: Update Order
Methods.Description: Updates an Order

Methods.Name: Delete Order
Methods.Description: Deletes a single order from a merchant.

Methods.Name: Get Order
Methods.Description: Returns a single order.

Methods.Name: Get New Orders List
Methods.Description: Returns a list of orders since last run datetime.

Methods.Name: Create Order
Methods.Description: Only supports basic order creation. Valid fields are limited to taxRemoved, note, title, and orderType. Adding line items must be done in separate calls.

Methods.Name: Get Payments List
Methods.Description: Retrieve payment information.

Methods.Name: Get Payment
Methods.Description: Get information for a single payment

Methods.Name: Get New Payments List
Methods.Description: Retrieve payment information created since last run datetime.

Methods.Name: Get Cash Event List for Device
Methods.Description: Retrieve cash events filtered by device ID

Methods.Name: Get Cash Event List for Employee
Methods.Description: Retrieve cash events filtered by employee ID

Methods.Name: Get Cash List
Methods.Description: Retrieve all cash events for merchant.

Methods.Name: Event Webhook
Methods.Description: Global webhook for all Clover events. https://docs.clover.com/build/webhooks/

Methods.Name: Customer Created Event Webhook
Methods.Description: Global webhook for all Clover events. https://docs.clover.com/build/webhooks/

Methods.Name: Customer Updated Event Webhook
Methods.Description: Global webhook for all Clover events. https://docs.clover.com/build/webhooks/

Methods.Name: Customer Delete Event Webhook
Methods.Description: Fires is customer deleted. Clover events. https://docs.clover.com/build/webhooks/
